doc.title: Days of Our Lives

credit.role: Dr. Carly Manning Alamain (Katerina von Leuschner) (1990-1993)
Karen - Secretary to Dr. Michael Horton
Nurse Callahan (1978) as Kathie Lee Johnson

doc.plot: "Like sands through the hourglass... so are the Days of Our Lives." These words, spoken by late cast member Macdonald Carey, open every episode of this daytime drama, chronicaling the trials and tribulations of the citizens of the fictional city of Salem.
